column5: So I finally remembered to download my Waypoints out of my lowrance. I downloaded the Lowrance GPS Data Manger utility and have saved them to my computer. The only problem I have now is that in the Waypoint list in it, I cannot copy and paste from it, thus no converting it into a text file. Has anyone out there used this utility?  hey Fang..... I am trying, you shouldnt have bought a Humminbird!!!LOL  Darren
I just highlight the waypoint you want to copy and then go to file and save as and save it to where you want.  I hope this is what you were after.
Thanks LD17 , ill give that a try toinight. Figured it would be something easy!
Allows me to save where ever I want but I cant find a function to save them as txt files.  I must be overlooking something
